original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary: US to dismantle intelligence center countering 'Russian influence', accused of censorship; Director Tulsi Gabbard claims declassified emails expose a coordinated effort by senior Obama-era officials to falsely accuse Trump of colluding with Russia. Meanwhile, Bolivian President Luis Arce criticizes US military deployment in the southern Caribbean, claiming it's a cover for political and economic domination in Latin America.</s>
